TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpacityConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于将不透明度值转换为字符串，或将字符串转换不透明度值。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，您并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 相反，您调用方法的类。Instead, you call the method of class. 有关详细信息的类型转换器，并查看代码示例，请参阅基本类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于转换值到它们的对应表示百分比或十进制小数表示为百分比的不透明度的值。The method is specialized to convert values that represent percentages or decimal fractions to their corresponding values, which represent the opacity as a percentage. 之外的类型传递给此方法的基类实现。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: 该对象不是转换所支持的类型。

span.span: The object was not a supported type for the conversion.

exception.span: 未能正确地转换为类型 。

span.span: could not be properly converted to type .
-or-

exception.span: 得到的转换后的 小于百分之零或大于百分之百。

span.span: The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

The parameter may be , so you should always verify the contents. Also, properties on the may also return . The resultant object is a representing the percentage of opacity.
